sentence.Network_en: Blades and segments are welded by braze, which facilitate change of segment.
sentence.Network_cn: 刀头的刀柄和刀头分开使用铜焊焊接, 容易更换刀头.

sentence.Network_en: The characteristics of the braze materials with different states were compared overall.
sentence.Network_cn: 对钎焊的特点及钎焊料应具备的性能进行了较为全面的论述.

sentence.Network_en: Attempting to braze a contaminated or improperly cleaned surface will result in an unsatisfactory joint.
sentence.Network_cn: 在被污染或未经正确清理的表面进行铜焊,其焊接效果将不会令人满意.
